description:
Kusakabe Yuki is a http://anidb.net/t2516 [timid snow] woman whose body is always cold. She will sometimes spread cold air while experiencing negative emotions and is susceptible to heat. She initially dislikes her http://anidb.net/t6862 [demi] nature, fearing that she could harm others, though http://anidb.net/ch86021 [Tetsuo] manages to show her that the only things she can actually freeze are her tears and sweat. She`s also secretly a manga enthusiast and has a taste for multiple genres.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Kusakabe Yuki
